name: @proof-of-residency/example-dao
description: A demo project to illustrate how to integrate with the Proof of Residency contracts.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copy-contracts && yarn compile
scripts.coverage: yarn build && yarn run -T hardhat coverage --temp artifacts
scripts.lint: yarn run -T solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol' && yarn run -T prettier --list-different 'contracts/**/*.sol'
